examples.input: I will teach you everything I know.
examples.truth: Teach you everything I know, I will.

examples.input: You must learn to control your fear.
examples.truth: Learn to control your fear, you must.

examples.input: The dark side clouds everything.
examples.truth: Cloud everything, the dark side does.

examples.input: Size matters not. Look at me.
examples.truth: Matter, size does not. At me, you look.

examples.input: We need to act quickly.
examples.truth: Quickly, we must act.

examples.input: Sometimes, the greatest lessons come from failure.
examples.truth: From failure, sometimes the greatest lessons come.

examples.input: Your path to the future depends on your choices.
examples.truth: Depends on your choices, your path to the future does.

examples.input: Happiness can be found even in the darkest of times.
examples.truth: Found, happiness can be, even in the darkest of times.

examples.input: Wisdom comes from experience, not from books.
examples.truth: From experience, wisdom comes, not from books.

examples.input: The force flows through all living things.
examples.truth: Through all living things, the force flows.

examples.input: Courage leads to victory.
examples.truth: To victory, courage leads.

examples.input: The journey of a thousand miles begins with a single step.
examples.truth: With a single step, the journey of a thousand miles begins.

examples.input: In the end, we all must face our fate.
examples.truth: Face our fate, we all must, in the end.

examples.input: True strength lies in the heart, not in the muscles.
examples.truth: In the heart, true strength lies, not in the muscles.

examples.input: Understanding the universe is a lifelong pursuit.
examples.truth: A lifelong pursuit, understanding the universe is.

examples.input: Do not fear failure; fear being inactive.
examples.truth: Fear not failure; fear inaction, you must.

examples.input: A wise mind is a powerful ally.
examples.truth: A powerful ally, a wise mind is.

examples.input: True victory is measured by the journey, not the destination.
examples.truth: By the journey, not by the destination, true victory is measured.

examples.input: Your mistakes teach you more than your successes.
examples.truth: More, your mistakes teach you than your successes.

examples.input: Believe in yourself, and you can overcome anything.
examples.truth: Overcome anything, you can, if in yourself you believe.

examples.input: Embrace change, for it is the only constant.
examples.truth: For the only constant, change is; embrace it.

examples.input: When you lose hope, you lose everything.
examples.truth: Everything, you lose, when hope you lose.

examples.input: In every end, there is a new beginning.
examples.truth: In every end, a new beginning there is.

examples.input: Compassion is the key to understanding.
examples.truth: The key to understanding, compassion is.

examples.input: If the Sith are involved, the Republic is in danger.
examples.truth: The very Republic is threatened, if involved the Sith are.

examples.input: The dark side is hard to see. We must discover who this assassin is.
examples.truth: Hard to see, the dark side is. Discover who this assassin is, we

examples.input: Qui-Gon, you must stay with this Naboo queen and protect her.
examples.truth: With this Naboo queen you must stay, Qui-Gon. Protect her.

examples.input: May the Force be with you.
examples.truth: May the Force be with you.

examples.input: Master Qui-Gon, do you have anything more to say?
examples.truth: Master Qui-Gon more to say have you?

examples.input: Are you saying it's a vergence?
examples.truth: A vergence, you say?

examples.input: But you do! Your opinion is obvious.
examples.truth: But you do! Revealed your opinion is.

examples.input: Are you requesting that he be trained as a Jedi?
examples.truth: Trained as a Jedi, you request for him?

examples.input: He will be tested.
examples.truth: Tested he will be.

examples.input: Good, good, young one. How do you feel?
examples.truth: Good, good, young one. How feel you?

examples.input: The future is in your hands.
examples.truth: In your hands, the future is.
